data.title: Descendants of Henry Howland
data.text:
Fourth Generation

46. Desire Gorham (Desire Howland , John , Henry ) was born on 20 May 1644 in Marshfield, Plymouth Co., MA. She died on 30 Jun 1700 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA.

Desire married John Hawes on 7 Oct 1661 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. John was born about 1640 in Duxbury, Plymouth Co., MA. He died on 11 Nov 1701 in Yarmouth, Barnstable.

They had the following children.

+ 167 M i Joseph Hawes was born on 16 Jul 1673. He died on 16 Nov 1752.+ 168 M ii Ebenezer Hawes was born on 24 Mar 1678. He died on 7 Oct 1727.

47. Temperance Gorham (Desire Howland , John , Henry ) was born on 5 May 1646 in Marshfield, Plymouth Co., MA. She died on 12 Mar 1715 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA.

Temperance married Edward Sturgis, son of Edward Sturgis and Elizabeth Hinckley, on 1/1 Mar 1662/1663 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. Edward was born on 10 May 1642 in Yarmouth, Barnstable. He died on 8 Dec 1678 in Yarmouth, Barnstable.

They had the following children.

169 M i Joseph Sturgis was born in 1664 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 16 Mar 1747 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. + 170 F ii Desire Sturgis was born in 1666. She died on 29 Mar 1749.+ 171 M iii Samuel Sturgis was born in 1668. He died on 12 Jan 1737.+ 172 M iv James Sturgis was born in 1669. He died on 3 Jan 1718.+ 173 M v Edward Sturgis was born in 1672. He died on 1 Jun 1738.+ 174 F vi Thankful Sturgis was born on 20 May 1675. She died on 1 May 1745. 175 F vii Hannah Sturgis was born about 1677 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. + 176 F viii Fear Sturgis was born in 1678. She died on 22 Jun 1753.

Temperance also married Thomas Baxter on 16/16 Jan 1679/1680. Thomas was born about 1653. He died on 22 Jun 1713.

48. Elizabeth Gorham (Desire Howland , John , Henry ) was born on 2 Apr 1648 in Marshfield, Plymouth Co., MA. She died on 5 Mar 1683.

Elizabeth married Joseph Hallett about 1663. Joseph was born about 1630 in England.

They had the following children.

+ 177 F i Elizabeth Hallett was born in 1674. She died on 1 Apr 1759.

49. James Gorham (Desire Howland , John , Henry ) was born on 28 Apr 1650 in Marshfield, Plymouth Co., MA. He died about 1707 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He was buried in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA.

James married Hannah Huckins on 24/24 Feb 1673/1674 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Hannah was born on 14 Oct 1653 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 13/13 Feb 1726/1727 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA.

They had the following children.

178 F i Desire Gorham was born on 9/9 Feb 1674/1675. + 179 M ii James Gorham was born on 6/6 Mar 1676/1677. He died on 10 Sep 1718.+ 180 F iii Experience Gorham was born on 24 Jul 1678. She died on 23 Dec 1733.+ 181 M iv John Gorham was born on 2 Aug 1680.+ 182 F v Mehitable Gorham was born on 20 Apr 1683.+ 183 M vi Thomas Gorham was born on 16 Dec 1684. He died on 3 Dec 1771. 184 F vii Mercy Gorham was born on 22 Nov 1686 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 12 Jun 1689 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. 185 M viii Joseph Gorham was born on 25 Mar 1689. + 186 M ix Jabez Gorham was born on 6/6 Mar 1690/1691. He died on 5/5 Mar 1739/1740. 187 M x Sylvanus Gorham was born on 13 Oct 1693 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. + 188 M xi Ebenezer Gorham was born on 14/14 Feb 1693/1694. He died on 16 Nov 1776.

50. John Gorham (Desire Howland , John , Henry ) was born on 20 Feb 1651 in Marshfield, Plymouth Co., MA. He was christened about Feb 1651/1652 in Marshfield, Plymouth, MA. He died on 1 Dec 1716 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He was buried in Cobb's Hill Cemetery, Barnstable Co., MA.

John married Mary Otis, daughter of John Otis and Mary Jacob, on 24 Feb 1673. Mary was born on 1 May 1653 in Hingham, Suffolk Co., MA. She died on 1 Apr 1733 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She was buried in Cobb's Hill Cemetery, Barnstable Co., MA.

They had the following children.

189 F i Temperance Gorham was born on 2 Aug 1678 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She was christened in 1686 in W. Barnstable Ch, , Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 3 Dec 1768 in Norten, Bristol, Co., MA. She was buried in Norten, Bristol, Co., MA. 190 F ii Mary Gorham was born on 18 Sep 1680 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She was christened in 1686 in W Barnstable Ch., , Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 23 Oct 1748 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She was buried in West Barnstable Cemetery, Barnstable Co., MA. + 191 M iii Stephen Gorham was born on 23 Jun 1683. He died in 1743. 192 M iv Shubael Gorham was born on 2 Sep 1686 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 20/20 Feb 1744/1745 in Louisbourg, Nova Scotia. He was buried in Louisburn, Cape Breton, Nova Scotia. 193 M v John Gorham was born on 28 Sep 1688 in Nantucket, Nantucket Co., MA. He was christened on 3/3 Mar 1688/1689 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 1 Apr 1769 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. 194 F vi Thankful Gorham was born on 15/15 Feb 1689/1690 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She was christened on 19 Apr 1691 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 20 Jan 1759 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. + 195 M vii Job Gorham was born on 30 Aug 1692. He died in 1762. 196 F viii Mercy Gorham was born on 1 Dec 1695 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She was christened on 5 Apr 1696 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 9 Apr 1782 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA.

51. Joseph Gorham (Desire Howland , John , Henry ) was born on 16 Feb 1652 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 9 Jul 1726 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. He was buried in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA.

Joseph married Sarah Sturgis, daughter of Edward Sturgis and Elizabeth Hinckley, on 23 Dec 1676 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. Sarah was born in 1655 in Sandwich, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 17 Oct 1736 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA.

They had the following children.

197 F i Sarah Gorham was born on 16/16 Jan 1677/1678 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 9 Sep 1705 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. She was buried in Old Burial Ground, North Dennis, Barnstable Co., MA. Sarah married Ebenezer Howes on 20 Apr 1699 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. Ebenezer was born about 1674 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 8/8 Jan 1726/1727 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. He was buried in Old Burial Ground, North Dennis, Barnstable Co., MA. 198 M ii Joseph Gorham was born on 15 Apr 1681 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 24 Apr 1742 in Stratford, Fairfield Co., CT. He was buried in Stratford, Fairfield Co., CT. Joseph married Sarah Kirk on 9 Nov 1708 in Charlestown, Middlesex Co., MA. Sarah was born in 1685 in Newfoundland, Canada. She died on 18 Apr 1722 in Stratford, Fairfield Co., CT. She was buried in Stratford, Fairfield Co., CT. 199 M iii Samuel Gorham was born on 15 Apr 1682 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. He died in Bristol, Bristol Co., RI. Samuel married Elizabeth Hedge in 1708 in Newport, Newport Co., RI. Elizabeth was born on 5 May 1687 in Ancient Cemetery, Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. 200 M iv John Gorham was born on 28/28 Feb 1683/1684 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. He died in 1768/1771. John married Mary Kirkham. + 201 F v Desire Gorham was born in Apr 1685. She died on 23 Jun 1749. 202 M vi Isaac Gorham was born in Oct 1687 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. He died in 1714. 203 M vii Hezekiah Gorham was born in Aug 1689 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. He died in 1714. + 204 M viii Josiah Gorham was born on 2 Dec 1692. He died on 2 Apr 1775.

52. Jabez Gorham (Desire Howland , John , Henry ) was born on 16 Feb 1654 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 16 May 1725 in Bristol, Bristol Co., RI.

Jabez married Hannah Sturgis, daughter of Edward Sturgis and Elizabeth Hinckley. Hannah was born on 22 Dec 1654 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 17 Oct 1736 in Harwich, Barnstable Co., MA.

They had the following children.

205 F i Hannah Gorham was born on 23 Dec 1677. + 206 F ii Elizabeth Gorham was born about 1680. She died on 17 Apr 1746. 207 M iii Samuel Gorham was born on 15 Apr 1682. 208 M iv Jabez Gorham was born on 31/31 Jan 1683/1684. + 209 M v Shubael Gorham was born on 2 Sep 1686. He died on 20/20 Feb 1745/1746. 210 M vi Isaac Gorham was born on 1/1 Feb 1688/1689. 211 M vii John Gorham was born on 8 Nov 1690. 212 M viii Joseph Gorham was born on 22 Aug 1692. 213 F ix Hannah Gorham was born on 21/21 Feb 1693/1694. 214 M x Benjamin Gorham was born on 11 Dec 1695. 215 M xi Thomas Gorham was born on 30 Oct 1701.

53. Mercy Gorham (Desire Howland , John , Henry ) was born on 20 Jan 1658 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 24 Sep 1725 in Westerly, Washington Co., RI.

Mercy married George Denison Jr., son of George Denison and Ann Borodell, about 1677. George was born on 16 Jul 1653 in Pequoit, New London Co., CT. He died on 27 Dec 1711 in Westerly, Washington Co., RI.

They had the following children.

+ 216 M i Edward Denison was born in 1678. He died on 9 Dec 1726 from drowned.+ 217 M ii Joseph Denison was born in 1681. He died on 18 Feb 1725. 218 F iii Mercy Denison was born in 1683. + 219 M iv Samuel Denison was born before 26 Sep 1686. 220 F v Desire Denison was born before 15 Jul 1688. She died in Died young. 221 F vi Elizabeth Denison was born on 11 Sep 1689 in Stonington, New London Co., CT. She died on 22 Nov 1749 in Charlestown, Washington, RI. + 222 F vii Desire Denison was born on 16 Apr 1693. She died on 13 Aug 1737.+ 223 F viii Thankful Denison was born on 1 Apr 1695.+ 224 M ix George Denison was born on 7 May 1699. He died on 16/16 Jan 1736/1737.

54. Lydia Gorham (Desire Howland , John , Henry ) was born on 6 Nov 1661 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 2 Aug 1744 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA.

Lydia married Hon. John Thatcher, son of Anthony Thacker and Elizabeth Jones, on 1/1 Jan 1684/1685 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. John was born on 17 Mar 1639 in Marblehead, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 8 May 1713 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA.

They had the following children.

+ 225 F i Lydia Thatcher was born on 11 Feb 1685. She died on 3 Sep 1724.+ 226 F ii Mary Thatcher was born on 5/5 Feb 1686/1687. She died on 28 Jun 1778.+ 227 F iii Desire Thatcher was born on 24 Dec 1688. She died on 6 May 1722.+ 228 F iv Hannah Thatcher was born on 9 Oct 1690. She died on 6 May 1780. 229 F v Mercy Thatcher was born on 23 Jul 1692 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 27 Aug 1692 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. + 230 M vi Judah Thatcher was born on 20 Aug 1693. He died on 8 Jan 1775. 231 F vii Mercy Thatcher was born on 28 Dec 1695 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 22 Aug 1696 in Yarmouth, Barnstable Co., MA. + 232 F viii Ann Thatcher was born on 7 May 1697. She died on 13 Mar 1756.+ 233 M ix Joseph Thatcher was born on 11 Jul 1699. He died on 17 Jun 1763.+ 234 M x Benjamin Thatcher was born on 25 Jul 1702. He died in 1768.+ 235 F xi Mercy Thatcher was born on 7 Feb 1704.+ 236 M xii Thomas Thatcher was born on 2 Apr 1705. He died on 20 Dec 1746.

56. Shubael Gorham (Desire Howland , John , Henry ) was born on 21 Oct 1667 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 7 Aug 1750 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA.

Shubael married Puella Hussey, daughter of Stephen Hussey and Martha Bunker, in May 1695. Puella was born on 10 Oct 1677 in Nantucket, Nantucket Co., MA. She died on 1 Mar 1763 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA.

They had the following children.

237 M i George Gorham was born on 29/29 Jan 1696/1697. + 238 F ii Abigail Gorham was born on 31 Mar 1699. She died on 28 Jun 1778.+ 239 F iii Lydia Gorham was born on 14 May 1701. She died on 1 Mar 1763. 240 F iv Hannah Gorham was born on 28 Jul 1703. 241 M v Theodate Gorham was born on 18 Jul 1705. 242 F vi Susannah Gorham was born on 8 Oct 1707. 243 M vii Daniel Gorham was born on 24 Sep 1708. + 244 F viii Desire Gorham was born on 26 Nov 1710. She died on 5 Nov 1801. 245 F ix Ruth Gorham was born on 7 May 1713. + 246 F x Deborah Gorham was born about 1715. She died on 21 Apr 1787.

58. Elizabeth Howland (John , John , Henry ) was born on 17 May 1655 in Duxbury, Plymouth Co., MA. She died on 17 Dec 1686 in Shrewsbury, Monmouth Co., NJ.

Elizabeth married John Bursley in Dec 1673 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. John was born on 11 Apr 1652 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 5 Aug 1726 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA.

They had the following children.

247 F i Elizabeth Bursley was born in Oct 1674 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She died in Oct 1675 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. 248 F ii Mercy Bursley was born in Oct 1675 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She died in 1676 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. 249 M iii John Bursley was born on 1 Mar 1678 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. John married Mary Crocker, daughter of Deacon Job Crocker and Hannah Taylor, on 11 Feb 1703 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Mary was born on 29 Jun 1681 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 10 Sep 1759 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. 250 F iv Mary Bursley was born on 23 May 1679 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Mary married Joseph Smith, son of Rev. John Smith and Susannah Hinckley. Joseph was born on 6 Dec 1667 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 14 Mar 1746 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. 251 M v Jabez Bursley was born on 21 Aug 1681 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 15 Jan 1732. Jabez married Hannah Fuller, daughter of Rev. Samuel Fuller and Elizabeth Nichols. Hannah was born on 17 Nov 1681 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She died about 1708 in Middleboro, Plymouth Co., MA. 252 F vi Joanna Bursley was born on 29 Nov 1684 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Joanna married Nathan Crocker, son of Eleazer Crocker and Ruth Chipman, on 10/10 Mar 1708/1709 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Nathan was born on 27 Apr 1685 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. 253 M vii Joseph Bursley was born on 29/29 Jan 1686/1687 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 23 Nov 1778 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Joseph married Sarah Crocker, daughter of Eleazer Crocker and Ruth Chipman, on 7 Nov 1712 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Sarah was born on 23/23 Mar 1688/1689 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. 254 F viii Abigail Bursley was born on 27 Aug 1690 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 31 Mar 1739. Abigail married Nathan Bodfish, son of Joseph Bodfish and Elizabeth Bessey, on 10/10 Mar 1712/1713 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Nathan was born on 27 Dec 1685 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. 255 F ix Elizabeth Bursley was born on 5 Aug 1692 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Elizabeth married Jonathan Crocker, son of Jonathan Crocker and Hannah Howland, on 28 Nov 1723 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Jonathan was born on 28 Aug 1696 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 21 Sep 1725 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. 256 F x Temperence Bursley was born on 30/30 Jan 1694/1695 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA.

60. Hannah Howland (John , John , Henry ) was born on 15 May 1661 in Duxbury, Plymouth Co., MA. She died on 11 Feb 1710 in East Haddam, Middlesex Co., CT.

Hannah married Jonathan Crocker, son of John Crocker and Mary Bodfish, on 20 May 1686 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Jonathan was born on 15 Jul 1662 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 24 Aug 1746 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He was buried in West Barnstable Graveyard, Barnstable Co., MA.

They had the following children.

257 F i Lydia Crocker was born on 26 Sep 1686 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. She died on 27 Mar 1780 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Lydia married Benjamin Bodfish, son of Joseph Bodfish and Elizabeth Bessey, on 10 Nov 1709 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Benjamin was born on 20 Jul 1683 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 25 May 1760 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. + 258 F ii Hannah Crocker was born on 26 Mar 1688. She died on 31 Mar 1751. 259 F iii Thankful Crocker was born on 6 Mar 1690 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. 260 M iv Isaac Crocker was born on 4 Apr 1692 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 8 Aug 1769 in Colchester, New London Co., CT. Isaac married Anne Smith, daughter of Joseph Smith and Anne Fuller, on 13 Dec 1718. Anne was born on 8 Nov 1695 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Isaac also married Elizabeth Fuller, daughter of Lt. Thomas Fuller and Elizabeth Lathrop, on 31 Oct 1726. Elizabeth was born on 3 Sep 1692 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. + 261 F v Reliance Crocker was born on 28 Jan 1694. She died on 4 May 1724. 262 M vi Jonathan Crocker was born on 28 Aug 1696 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 21 Sep 1725 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Jonathan married Elizabeth Bursley, daughter of John Bursley and Elizabeth Howland, on 28 Nov 1723 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. Elizabeth was born on 5 Aug 1692 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. 263 M vii James Crocker was born on 3 Sep 1699 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 7 Nov 1785 in Westchester, New London Co., CT. James married Alice Swift, daughter of Jireh Swift and Abigail Gibbs, on 21 Nov 1721. Alice was born on 23 Jul 1698 in Salem, Essex Co., MA. She died on 15 Jan 1783 in Westchester, New London Co., CT. 264 M viii Ephraim Crocker was born in Apr 1702 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA. He died on 1 May 1704 in Barnstable, Barnstable Co., MA.
